Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientView
public class ClientView
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the object used by the client to store game information retrieved from the server. It makes use of beans to keep track of the current state of the game's elements.

  • Constructor Summary
